sections.name: Short title
sections.description: Code of Ordinances, City of Gulfport, Mississippi

sections.name: General penalty
sections.description: Violation: fine up to $1,000 and/or 90 days imprisonment, unless otherwise specified

sections.name: Mayor
sections.description: Chief executive, elected at-large for 4-year term

sections.name: City Council
sections.description: Seven members elected from wards for 4-year terms

sections.name: License required
sections.description: All businesses must obtain city license before operating

sections.name: Fees
sections.description: Varies by business type: $50-$5,000 annually

sections.name: Alcohol permits
sections.description: Special license required. On-premise and off-premise permits available. Hours: 10 AM - 10 PM Sunday-Thursday, 10 AM - Midnight Friday-Saturday

sections.name: Food service
sections.description: Health permit required. Annual inspection

sections.name: Transient merchants
sections.description: Special permit required. Bond: $5,000

sections.name: Speed limits
sections.description: School zones: 15 MPH. Residential: 25 MPH. Business: 30 MPH. Beach Boulevard: 35 MPH

sections.name: Parking
sections.description: Metered parking downtown. Handicap violations: $150. Residential permit parking zones

sections.name: Beach parking
sections.description: Parking on beach permitted in designated areas. No overnight parking

sections.name: Truck routes
sections.description: Heavy trucks restricted to designated routes. Weight limit: 10 tons on residential streets

sections.name: Noise ordinance
sections.description: Residential: 55 dB day, 45 dB night. Commercial: 65 dB day, 55 dB night. Special provisions for entertainment district

sections.name: Curfew
sections.description: Under 17: 11 PM - 6 AM Sunday-Thursday, Midnight - 6 AM Friday-Saturday

sections.name: Public intoxication
sections.description: Fine: $100-$500. Treatment program may be required

sections.name: Open container
sections.description: Prohibited in public except during permitted events. Fine: $100-$500

sections.name: Beach regulations
sections.description: No glass containers, fires in designated areas only, dogs allowed on leash in designated areas

sections.name: Garbage collection
sections.description: Weekly pickup. Container must be at curb by 7 AM

sections.name: Illegal dumping
sections.description: Fine: $500-$2,500 plus cleanup costs

sections.name: Smoking
sections.description: Prohibited in public buildings, restaurants, beaches

sections.name: Permits required
sections.description: New construction, additions, electrical, plumbing, HVAC

sections.name: Coastal construction
sections.description: Special requirements for flood zone construction. Elevation requirements apply

sections.name: Wind mitigation
sections.description: Hurricane-resistant construction required for new buildings

sections.name: Zoning districts
sections.description: R-1, R-2, R-3, C-1, C-2, C-3, I-1, I-2, Waterfront

sections.name: Setbacks
sections.description: Front: 25 feet. Sides: 8 feet. Rear: 20 feet. Varies by district

sections.name: Waterfront district
sections.description: Special regulations for harbor, marina, and beachfront development

sections.name: Rental registration
sections.description: Annual registration required. Fee: $25/unit

sections.name: Minimum standards
sections.description: Housing code compliance required

sections.name: Vacant properties
sections.description: Registration required after 60 days vacant. Fee: $200/year

sections.name: Leash law
sections.description: Dogs must be leashed off owner's property

sections.name: Beach dogs
sections.description: Dogs permitted on beach on leash in designated areas only

sections.name: License required
sections.description: Annual license: $5 spayed/neutered, $25 intact

sections.name: Beach protection
sections.description: No vehicles on beach except emergency and maintenance

sections.name: Dune protection
sections.description: No disturbance of dunes without permit

sections.name: Seawalls
sections.description: Permit required for construction or modification

metadata.notes: Second largest city in Mississippi. Major port city with unique coastal regulations.
